meanings.definition: A person employed to clean and maintain a building.
meanings.sent1: The janitor swept the floors every evening.
meanings.sent2: The school janitor is responsible for keeping the hallways clean.
meanings.sent3: The janitor found a lost sock while cleaning the classroom.
meanings.sent4: She was like a janitor, tidying up the mess of broken promises.
meanings.sent5: The janitor's keychain jingled as he walked down the corridor.

meanings.definition: To clean or maintain a building as a janitor.
meanings.sent1: He will janitor the office after everyone leaves.
meanings.sent2: She janitors the entire apartment complex on weekends.
meanings.sent3: I need to janitor my room before guests arrive.
meanings.sent4: The team will janitor the stadium before the big game.
meanings.sent5: They janitor the school gymnasium every summer break.
